did.unittitle: Military Order of the Loyal Legion reports of Committees of Investigation

scopecontent.p: Records of the Committees of Investigation, appointed to investigate possible new members into the Military Order of the Loyal Legion. It appears that all members fought in the Civil War with the Union Army. Volume includes letters, minutes, and circulars containing rank, regiment and period of service of candidates and determinations about their eligibility for membership.
